professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Database Administrator with expertise in performance tuning, replication, backup/restore, disaster recovery, and high availability solutions. Proficient in using SSRS and SSIS for data management and ETL processes.

key_responsibilities: Experience with AlwaysOn (2&3 Replicas) and cluster building for 2-node and 3-node configurations.
On-call support for database issues and system monitoring.
Experience with SQL Server replication and mirroring.
Database migrations and support for development/testing environments.
Experience with high availability solutions like AlwaysOn.

tools_and_software:
SQL Profiler",
            "Data Transformation Services (DTS)",
            "AlwaysOn",
            "Availability Groups",
            "SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS)",
            "SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)
